name: Tropical Paradise Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Shredded coconut and kiwi slices (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen pineapple, mango, banana, vanilla whey, and coconut milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Top with shredded coconut and kiwi slices
Optional: Add fresh pineapple, passion fruit, or granola
